name: DecaData
desc: POS data mapped to over 50k CPG products, available daily back to 2007. Products are mapped to brands and parent companies
full_ticker_coverage: 250+ Globally traded public companies, 000's of private companies
full_sector_coverage: Global CPG companies . Daily sales data from multiple retail banners.
pricing_structure: Pricing flexible based on consumption and data delivery timelines.
why_us?: Clean, flexible, detailed data. More signal for your $
advantages: We have built a product specifically to be used by the investment management community- not CPG firms. We deliver clean, reliable GRANULAR data in near real-time in a format that you can work with.
use_cases: Corporate sales analysis, Product launch analysis, Private Label data (rare) for analysis of competitive trends.
